name: Bit Path
description:
A short puzzle game made for the Fennel game jam.

Navigate your way through 13 increasingly challenging levels.

Source: https://github.com/rottencandy/fennel-jam

Instructions:

Move  -  Arrow keys
Reset level  -  Z

You have limited energy to move in any direction.
Collect the power source to complete the level.
You can only collect it if you have no more energy left.

Made using:

Tic-80  -  https://github.com/nesbox/TIC-80
Fennel  -  https://fennel-lang.org
Color palette  -  https://lospec.com/palette-list/violet-dreams
